#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
long long gcd(long long a,long long b){
    if(a%b==0) return b;
    return gcd(b,a%b);
}
int main() {
    long long t,n,i,x,count,e1,o1,e2,o2,l,m;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--){
          scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&m);

          if(n%2==0) e1=o1=n/2;
          else {
                e1=n/2;
                o1=n-n/2;
          }

          if(m%2==0) e2=o2=m/2;
          else {
                e2=m/2;
                o2=m-m/2;
          }

          i=e1*o2+o1*e2;
          n*=m;
          m=gcd(i,n);
          cout<<i/m<<"/"<<n/m<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
